name: GBS Sans (Gb Studio 3 typeface)
description:
GB Sans is a variable width, semi condensed, sans serif typeface for use with GB Studio 3 available in (currently) two weights –

  • Regular
  • Italic

This is a first version and I'll continue to work on and improve the letter forms (as I use and look at them more) and expand the typeface to include other variants such as bold.

Open to all suggestions for improvements, just let me know in the comments!


Background
I wanted a variable width (not wide monospaced) typeface that could mix italics inline with regular for my next GB Studio project because I like doing that. GB Studio v3 opens up so many more options for type. Hopefully it's of use to other people and their projects as well.


Instructions for use
Add files into the fonts folder, within the assets folder in your game. To switch between fonts, use the command '!f' in your dialogue boxes.

Usage
You're welcome to use in your projects and I'd love to see what people use it for. I'd appreciate a credit if you do use it.
